Summary: Three circular white luminous UFOs; jet planes searching for the UFOs; one jet chased one of the UFOs
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Lockport
There was one other sighting in Lockport on or around September 17th 1957
divs: Sighting DetailsYesterday I submitted a detailed report on a sighting of three UFOs by myself, my parents and my sister on 17-Sep-1957 near Lockport (Niagara County), NY. When the second form came up for providing additional information, I did my best to provide the information sought. However, I now realize I incorrectly answered the queries regarding whether or not each of the witnesses wore eyeglasses. Although we all wore eyeglasses later in life, at the time of the sighting (17-Sep-1957), none of us (my father, my mother, my sister and me) wore eyeglasses.
